Constructor Detail

D3Connection

public D3Connection(java.lang.String pserver,
                    int pport,
                    java.lang.String pusername,
                    java.lang.String ppassword,
                    int ptype)
             throws D3Exception
Create a new Connection to a D3 server or Proxy
Parameters:
pserver - the server name or IP adress
pport - the port number
pusername - the name of the user to connect
ppassword - the password for the connection
ptype - the type of the connection
  • D3Constants.CONNECTION_TCP = connection directly to a D3 server
  • D3Constants.CONNECTION_TCP_PROXY = connection to a D3 proxy server (usual used for applet)
  • D3Constants.CONNECTION_RMI = connection to a D3 RMI Server Todo try to secure the connection with login mandatory
